com.swirl

Class Placement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirl.SObject
      • com.swirl.Placement

  • public class Placement
extends SObject
    A Placement is a logical area within a Location. Signals are tied to a Placement and Content is targeted at a Placement.

    • Method Detail

      • isOverlapping

        public boolean isOverlapping()
        Is the Placement an overlapping placement (or an exclusive placement). Originally specific to beacon placements to determine it beacons in this placement are allowed to overlap -- meaning that the device is allowed to be "in" multiple beacons simultaneously.
        Returns:
        true if the placement is overlapping, false otherwise.

        public java.lang.String toString()
